result.name: 2003-2009-english-and-welsh-coast-crustacea-sample-metrics
result.notes:
Port sampling of Nephrops (*Nephrops norvegicus*), edible crab (*Cancer 
pagurus*) and Lobster (*Homarus gammarus*) carried out in various ports in 
England. Mandatory sampling was done periodically to assertain length weight 
relationship of the above species.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.
